name: Parika
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself: "Man there just are not enough local coop games out there..."? Yes me too. Parika is a local coop 2D platformer/shooter in pixel-art.

Local multiplayer. You play this game against your friend. Three weapons will allow you to destroy your friend in a duel to the literal death. To five literal deaths to be precised. In order to save you from being killed, both of you will be provided by extra ammo and health packs. Additionally you have a shield to prevent some damage done by bullets. Moving around through means of portals, floating platforms and jump pads will make the game a lot faster.

Prepare for a local multiplayer session with your friend that will test your skills at gaming and in your friendship.

Singleplayer. A deathly training facility is build for you to improve certain survival strategies. Multiple obstacles and enemies will await you to stop you from your journey. The goal is "just" to get through the stage in as less deaths as possible.

Though main focus lies on coop and challenging your friends, none the less Singleplayer will challenge yourself and train for a bigger fight.
